LightningComponentBundle.description: Adds extra space and an optional horizontal rule

property.name: exactSize
property.label: Exact Spacing Size
property.description: If used, will override 'size' value with exact px, rem, or other dimensions. Space will be added both above and below border if used.

property.name: removeSpacing
property.label: Remove Default Component Spacing
property.description: When checked, this will account for removing the default spacing between components in communities of 1.5rem for the spacer.
